resources.string:
Hi, my name is Bozhena. 

My name is quite unusual and i like it. 
I am 21 years old. I was born in Krasnodar and I have lived there all my live. 

I finished school in 2017. I am a student of Kuban State Agrarian University. My major is Applied Informatics. 
Also I work for KubSAU. I am laboratory assistant of the Department of system analysis and information processing. 

I go to the gym or do sports home when I have some free time. 
What about my character, I am a kind person. 
Comfort in everything is very important to me. In communication with people and in my attitude. 

Now I would like to tell you about my hobbies. I prefer active and healthy recreation. For example, go on a SAP-surfing, play team sports, or take a walk in the woods or in the mountains. 

If you have to choose between a cat and a dog, I will choose a dog. 

I like to learn something new in my professional life and learn more about this world every day.
